ActivityNode.DisplayName: Deploy CSR and Configure Params failed (5003)

Configuration.DisplayName: Deploy CSR and Configure Params failed (5003)

ActivityNode.Notes: Fail the entire process

Script.HardcodedValue:
param( [String]$vCenterServer ,[String]$vCenterPort ,[String]$vCenterProtocol ,[String]$vCenterUsername ,[String]$vCenterPassword ,[String]$vAppName ,[String]$resourcePool ,[String]$dstore ,[String]$vAppPropertyId_username ,[String]$vAPP_username ,[String]$vAppPropertyId_password ,[String]$vAPP_password ,[String]$vAppPropertyId_mgmtIP ,[String]$vAPP_mgmtIP ,[String]$vAppPropertyId_gateway ,[String]$vAPP_gateway ,[String]$vAppPropertyId_hostname ,[String]$vAPP_hostname ,[String]$vAppPropertyId_ssh ,[String]$vAPP_ssh ,[String]$vAppPropertyId_enablePassword ,[String]$vAPP_enablePassword ,[String]$vAppPropertyId_domain ,[String]$vAPP_domain ,[String]$ovalocation ,[String]$PortProfile ,[String]$dsCluster ,[String]$vAPP_remoteMgmtLabel ,[String]$vAPP_remoteMgmtIP ,[String]$vAPP_PNSCIPLabel ,[String]$vAPP_PNSCMgmtIP ,[String]$vAPP_PNSCPortLabel ,[String]$vAPP_PNSCPort ,[String]$vAPP_PNSCSecretLabel ,[String]$vAPP_PNSCSecret ,[String]$vAPP_defaultRoutekey ,[String]$vAPP_defaultRouteCmd )
trap { # "`nError Information`n=================`nCategory: {0}`nID: {2}`nType: {1}#`nMessage: {3}" -f # $_.CategoryInfo.Category, $_.Exception.GetType().FullName, # $_.FullyQualifiedErrorID, $_.Exception.Message # $_.ErrorDetails # $_ $_.Exception.Message $LASTEXITCODE = 0 $ERROR.clear() exit 9027 }
$ErrorActionPreference = "Stop"
Add-PSSnapin VMware.VimAutomation.Core
Connect-VIServer -Server $vCenterServer -Port $vCenterPort -Protocol $vCenterProtocol -User $vCenterUsername -Password $vCenterPassword -WarningAction SilentlyContinue | Out-Null
try{
function Get-InventoryPath { param ($Object) $foldermark = 0
$Path = $Object.Name do { if ( $Object.Id -cmatch "(Folder|Resources)" ) { $Parent = (Get-Folder $Object).parent } else { $Parent = (Get-View $Object).parent if ( $Parent -cmatch "(Folder|ResourcePool)" ) { $foldermark = 1 } elseif ( $foldermark ) { # a non-folder just to the left of a folder: # remove the folder off the start of the path # this will also remove the Datacenters/ $Path = ( $Path.split( '/', 2 ) )[-1] $foldermark = 0 } } if ($Parent -ne $null) { if ($Parent.Id -cmatch "Folder") { $Path = (Get-Folder $Parent).Name + "/" + $Path } else { $Path = (Get-View $Parent).Name + "/" + $Path } $Object = $Parent } } while ($Parent -ne $null)
Write-Output $Path }
$rp = Get-ResourcePool -id $resourcePool $cluster = $rp.ExtensionData.Owner $vhost = (Get-Cluster -Id $cluster).ExtensionData.Host[0] $VMHost = Get-VMHost -Id $vhost if ($PortProfile -ne "") {$PortgroupId = Get-VirtualPortGroup -Name $PortProfile -Distributed -VMHost (Get-VMHost $VMHost)} if ($dsCluster -eq "Yes") { $ds = Get-DatastoreCluster -id $dstore } else { $ds = Get-Datastore -id $dstore }
$vms = Import-VApp -Source $ovalocation -Name $vAppName -Location $rp -VMHost $VMHost -Datastore $ds
$vapp = Get-VM -Name $vAppName $prop_username = $vapp.ExtensionData.Config.VAppConfig.Property | where {$_.Id -eq $vAppPropertyId_username} $prop_password = $vapp.ExtensionData.Config.VAppConfig.Property | where {$_.Id -eq $vAppPropertyId_password} $prop_mgmtIP = $vapp.ExtensionData.Config.VAppConfig.Property | where {$_.Id -eq $vAppPropertyId_mgmtIP} $prop_gateway = $vapp.ExtensionData.Config.VAppConfig.Property | where {$_.Id -eq $vAppPropertyId_gateway} $prop_remoteMgmt = $vapp.ExtensionData.Config.VAppConfig.Property | where {$_.Id -eq $vAPP_remoteMgmtLabel} $prop_hostname = $vapp.ExtensionData.Config.VAppConfig.Property | where {$_.Id -eq $vAppPropertyId_hostname} $prop_ssh = $vapp.ExtensionData.Config.VAppConfig.Property | where {$_.Id -eq $vAppPropertyId_ssh} $prop_enablePassword = $vapp.ExtensionData.Config.VAppConfig.Property | where {$_.Id -eq $vAppPropertyId_enablePassword} $prop_domain = $vapp.ExtensionData.Config.VAppConfig.Property | where {$_.Id -eq $vAppPropertyId_domain} $prop_pnscIp = $vapp.ExtensionData.Config.VAppConfig.Property | where {$_.Id -eq $vAPP_PNSCIPLabel} $prop_pnscPort = $vapp.ExtensionData.Config.VAppConfig.Property | where {$_.Id -eq $vAPP_PNSCPortLabel} $prop_pnscSecret = $vapp.ExtensionData.Config.VAppConfig.Property | where {$_.Id -eq $vAPP_PNSCSecretLabel}
$vm = Get-VM $vAppName
$spec = New-Object VMware.Vim.VirtualMachineConfigSpec $spec.VAppConfig = New-Object VMware.Vim.VmConfigSpec $newProp = New-Object VMware.Vim.VAppPropertySpec $info = New-Object VMware.Vim.VirtualMachineConfigInfo $newProp.Operation = "edit"
$newProp.Info = $prop_username $newProp.Info.Value = $vAPP_username $spec.VAppConfig.Property += $newProp $vm.ExtensionData.ReconfigVM($spec)
$newProp.Info = $prop_password $newProp.Info.Value = $vAPP_password $spec.VAppConfig.Property += $newProp $vm.ExtensionData.ReconfigVM($spec)
$newProp.Info = $prop_mgmtIP $newProp.Info.Value = $vAPP_mgmtIP $spec.VAppConfig.Property += $newProp $vm.ExtensionData.ReconfigVM($spec)
$newProp.Info = $prop_gateway $newProp.Info.Value = $vAPP_gateway $spec.VAppConfig.Property += $newProp $vm.ExtensionData.ReconfigVM($spec)
$newProp.Info = $prop_remoteMgmt $newProp.Info.Value = $vAPP_remoteMgmtIP $spec.VAppConfig.Property += $newProp $vm.ExtensionData.ReconfigVM($spec)
$newProp.Info = $prop_hostname $newProp.Info.Value = $vAPP_hostname $spec.VAppConfig.Property += $newProp $vm.ExtensionData.ReconfigVM($spec)
$newProp.Info = $prop_ssh $newProp.Info.Value = $vAPP_ssh $spec.VAppConfig.Property += $newProp $vm.ExtensionData.ReconfigVM($spec)
$newProp.Info = $prop_enablePassword $newProp.Info.Value = $vAPP_enablePassword $spec.VAppConfig.Property += $newProp $vm.ExtensionData.ReconfigVM($spec)
$newProp.Info = $prop_pnscIp $newProp.Info.Value = $vAPP_PNSCMgmtIP $spec.VAppConfig.Property += $newProp $vm.ExtensionData.ReconfigVM($spec)
$newProp.Info = $prop_pnscPort $newProp.Info.Value = $vAPP_PNSCPort $spec.VAppConfig.Property += $newProp $vm.ExtensionData.ReconfigVM($spec)
$newProp.Info = $prop_pnscSecret $newProp.Info.Value = $vAPP_PNSCSecret $spec.VAppConfig.Property += $newProp $vm.ExtensionData.ReconfigVM($spec)
$newProp.Info = $prop_domain $newProp.Info.Value = $vAPP_domain $spec.VAppConfig.Property += $newProp $vm.ExtensionData.ReconfigVM($spec)
$spec1 = New-Object VMware.Vim.VirtualMachineConfigSpec $spec1.vAppConfig = New-Object VMware.Vim.VmConfigSpec $spec1.vAppConfig.property = New-Object VMware.Vim.VAppPropertySpec[] (1) $spec1.vAppConfig.property[0] = New-Object VMware.Vim.VAppPropertySpec $spec1.vAppConfig.property[0].operation = "add" $spec1.vAppConfig.property[0].info = New-Object VMware.Vim.VAppPropertyInfo $spec1.vAppConfig.property[0].info.key = $vAPP_defaultRouteKey $spec1.vAppConfig.property[0].info.classId = "com.cisco.csr1000v" $spec1.vAppConfig.property[0].info.instanceId = "1" $spec1.vAppConfig.property[0].info.id = "ios-config" $spec1.vAppConfig.property[0].info.category = "3. Additional Configuration Properties" $spec1.vAppConfig.property[0].info.label = "default-route" $spec1.vAppConfig.property[0].info.type = "string" $spec1.vAppConfig.property[0].info.userConfigurable = $true $spec1.vAppConfig.property[0].info.defaultValue = $vAPP_defaultRouteCmd $spec1.vAppConfig.property[0].info.value = $vAPP_defaultRouteCmd $spec1.vAppConfig.property[0].info.description = "Default route for management" $nores = $vm.ExtensionData.ReconfigVM_Task($spec1)
Write-Output '<results>' if ( $vm ) { Write-Output '<row>' [System.String]::Concat(' <UniqueName>',$vm.Id,'</UniqueName>') [System.String]::Concat(' <VMName>',$vm.Name,'</VMName>') [System.String]::Concat(' <Moref>',$vm.Id,'</Moref>') [System.String]::Concat('<VMFullPath>',( Get-InventoryPath $vm ),'</VMFullPath>') [System.String]::Concat('<PGFullPath>',$PortgroupId.Id,'</PGFullPath>') Write-Output '</row>' } Write-Output '</results>' }
finally { disconnect-VIServer -Confirm:$false }
